Minimum interval (in ticks) between checks of a player's inventory when it changes
Higher values are kinder on server TPS, especially if players inventories change frequently, but mean longer delays for quest auto-completion messages.

Linear: quest must be complete before dependant quests are started
Flexible: tasks in dependant quests can be progressed at any time,
  but dependant quests can't be completed until dependency is completed

• Jump to a quest with '#<quest_id>' (use Copy ID to get quest id's)

ftbquests.chapter.data.title: Finality Genesis
ftbquests.chapter.age_of_enchanting.subt: With the power of Create Enchantment Industries...
ftbquests.chapter.age_of_enchanting.ques: Enchantment Industries - The Disenchanter
Liquid experience!
Need to store XP safely before venturing out? This is one solution!
You can also get liquid XP from disenchanting items with enchantments.
Automated enchanting, disenchanting and mob farms with Deployers and more!
&l&4<wiggle><shake>Remember to hold [w] to Ponder...</shake></wiggle>&r
With &aCreate Enchantment Industry&r you can:
- Automate enchanting
- Store your experience in Fluid Tanks
- Get experience from disenchanting tools with the Disenchanter
Deployers are also now able to produce Experience Nuggets when a mob is killed! Please keep in mind that this is a feature of Create Enchantment Industries and not base Create without any addons.
Introduction to Create Enchantment Industries
Enchantment Industries - The Printer
It's an Enchantment Book printing press!
&aLiquid Experience&r and &bHyper Experience&r are used to print Enchantment Books.
Ink is required to print more of the same written books, NOT enchantment books.
Enchantment Industries - The Enchanting Guide
Blazes can now enchant for you!
Obtain a Bottle O' Hyper Enchanting
Consolidated liquid experience!
In order to make Liquid Hyper Experience, you will need to combine XP with &91x Lapis Lazuli&r and &31x Glowing Ink Sac&r in a &bsuperheated&r basin and mix them together.
I expect you to fully automate this process.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.title: Apotheosis
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.subtitle: Apotheosis is that one mod that makes everything powerful.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests0.tit: Congrats! You sacrificed your item to the dark gods!
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests0.sub: Gem Dust has lots of utility.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests0.des: If your item happens to already have slots, you can use a Smithing Table to socket your gems.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests1.sub: Sacrifice the stuff to get materials for the powerful stuff, got it?
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests1.des: You can now use Millstones, Crushing Wheels or an Anvil to get gem dust.
Gem dust is then used for upgrading gems, reforging items, making the &9Sigil of Socketing&r to add more sockets, etc.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests2.sub: Make a Salvaging Table, it's important. It is really important.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests2.des: This salvages Affixed items and converts them into Rarity Materials.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests3.des: Use a Salvaging Table to acquire this material from items with a &8dark gray&r name color.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests4.des: Use a Salvaging Table to acquire this material from items with a &agreen&r name color.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests5.des: Use a Salvaging Table to acquire this material from items with a &9blue&r name color.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests6.des: Use a Salvaging Table to acquire this material from items with a &5dark purple&r name color.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests8.sub: The gem is saved, but the item is gone!
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests8.des: The &dVial of Arcane Extraction&r allows you to &akeep&r the &l&5gem(s)&r socketed in your &bAffixed item&r, but it &l&cdestroys&r your &bAffixed item&r in the process.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests9.sub: You monster, what have you done?
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests9.des: The &6Vial of Searing Expulsion&r allows you to &l&cdestroy&r the &l&5gem(s)&r socketed inside your &bAffixed item&r and allows you to keep your said Affixed item.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests10.ti: Introduction to Apotheosis - Chronicle of Shadows
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests10.su: This book explains Apotheosis things, please use it.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests10.de: This quest tree is a work in progress and is not completely documented.
For now, if you have the book in your possession you can give it a quick read and complete this quest node to proceed to the next.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests11.ti: This is not your ordinary enchanting table!
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests11.de: This Enchanting Table is significantly more powerful.
Use different bookshelves in order to modify the levels of the 3 different aspects of Apotheosis enchanting: Eterna, Quanta and Arcana.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests20.su: Extracts half of the enchantments at the cost of your item.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests22.ti: Ultimate Item Reforging - The Reforging Table
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests22.su: This is where things get VERY interesting.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests22.de: With this, you can now make the most &6powerful&r tools imaginable, don't say I warned you.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests23.su: This is used for upgrading gems.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests23.de: Found a gem you really want to keep and want to upgrade? The Gem Cutting Table allows that.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests24.su: This is for giving regular items Affixes.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests24.de: So let's say you made a new diamond sword and want to make it even more powerful like the one you looted from the world.
The &9Simple Reforging Table&r is what you use! It is limited by what tier it can reforge items however. That's what the &6Reforging Table&r is in the next quest node.
To reforge an item, you will need a lot of rarity scrap material, gem dust and XP. To acquire rarity scrap materials, see the Salvaging 101 quest node near the center of the quest tree grid.
If your item has any empty sockets, you can socket gems using the smithing table.
ftbquests.chapter.apotheosis.quests25.su: These arrows are not your typical arrows.
ftbquests.chapter.architect_age.title: Create: Architect Age
ftbquests.chapter.architect_age.subtitle: Create's decorative palette colors.
Collect the basic building materials for each color palette in the Minecraft group.
At least try each of them, because I believe they would look wonderful in a lot of builds. Look at CraisinLord's Integrated structures!
Collect the basic building materials for each color palette in the Create group.
At least try each of them, because I believe they would look wonderful in a lot of builds. Look at CraisinLord's Integrated structures!
Limestone can be made by making honey flow into lava.
Scoria is extremely burned chocolate, with Scorchia being even more burnt.
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.title: Artifacts
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.subtitle: Collect them all!
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests1.subt: Fortune that will never be found at the end of the rainbow.
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests6.desc: Unfortunately no, the umbrella can't shoot.
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests7.subt: Each of these are different, be sure to read what they do.
ftbquests.chapter.artifacts.quests11.des: A seventy inch plasma wide screen TV.
ftbquests.chapter.baubley_heart_canister: You need something to store additional pieces of your soul.
The same process applies to the rest of the tiers.
Eternal nutrition and an essential component.
You can collect Wither Bones from Wither Skeletons or by haunting regular bones.
You need something to store your soul. :3
The Heart Amulet is what contains your Heart Containers, which then increase how much health you have.
On the next page is a list of sources of the different tiers of hearts and how to &aupgrade&r them.
&cRed Hearts&r drop from normal enemies like zombies, skeletons, creepers, etc.
&aGreen Hearts&r drop exclusively from the &dEnder Dragon&r.
However... you can upgrade existing Red Hearts by &omelting&r 9 of them and combining them all in a 3x3 crafting grid to make a &eMelted Yellow Heart&r.
Then you can take 9 &eMelted Yellow Hearts&r to combine them into a &aMelted Green Heart&r.
Think of the Soul Amulet as being able to hold 10 Undying Totems, literally.
However, instead of Undying Totems they are referred to as &dSoul Heart Canisters&r which convert back to a &9Blue Heart Canister&r after being used.
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.title: Blue Skies
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.subtitle: More dimensions. Quest tree is a work in progress!
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests0.sub: This book actually explains everything for the most part.
ftbquests.chapter.blue_skies.quests0.tas: Acquire the Zeal Lighter from the Gatekeeper
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.title: Age of Combat
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.subtitle: A lot of boss fights and indestructible tools!
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests0.subt: Defeat the Netherite Monstrosity and acquire the Infernal Forge.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests0.desc: Be prepared. I suggest Fire Resistance and Health Regeneration potions.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests2.desc: Choose a reward afterwards, just to make it easier for you.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests3.subt: You will need to deal with the Ender Dragon first.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests4.subt: Win the battle and earn the Gauntlet of Guard.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests5.titl: Acquire the Heart of the Harbinger
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests5.subt: It needs a heart of power to be activated.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests6.subt: Give the Harbinger its heart, then prepare for the worst.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests7.subt: Acquire the Void Core while you are still there.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests8.subt: Now bring harmony between your tools of destruction.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests10.sub: Push with the force of mountains.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests12.des: It's actually very visible on the ocean surface...
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests13.sub: Come prepared, or face certain death.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests13.des: I recommend using the &9Will of the Ocean&r spellstone to make swimming much easier.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests14.des: &d&lI did tell you to come prepared both for the altar activation AND a boss fight of your life.&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests15.sub: Also, you now have a baby leviathan in your possession now.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests15.des: Tame and heal the baby leviathan with some tropical fish.
Please try to protect it at all costs >.>
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests16.sub: Something new lurks in the deep.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests16.des: The water is also pretty cold, so take that into consideration.
Once you complete this full set of armor, you can brave the freezing waters...
The question remains... where is the helmet?
If you're wondering where to find the &dIce Maze&r head to a Frozen Deep Ocean biome and look for ice with snow spirals on top of it. There's also going to be more ice than usual.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests16.tas: Suit up and fine a Deep Cold Ocean biome.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests17.des: An aura of evil whispers into your ear as you hold the bone dagger in your hand...
Be sure to hold a glass bottle in your off hand while doing this.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests19.sub: You feel vibrations under the ice...
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests19.tas: Kill the Mother of the Maze.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests20.tit: Putting the Captain to Rest - Pt.1
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests20.des: Make sure you are prepared with the Terrible Sword.
It is the one of the few weapons that can actually defeat her and put an end to her suffering.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests21.tit: Putting the Captain to Rest - Pt.2
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests21.sub: With the sound of the horn, Captain Cornelia appears.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests22.tit: <shake>Fill a vessel with the blood of the innocent...</shake>
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests22.des: I'll just say it here if the creepy hint isn't enough:
Use the Bone Dagger to gather &4blood&r from unsuspecting villagers...
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests23.des: You will need the upper, middle and lower components.
You will need to find the three bone staff pieces from a special structures throughout the world. One can be found in what looks to be a flesh pit. The others are for you to find out.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests24.des: Once you get on the island, place the bone staff fragments in order in front of the altar. The blocks stand out very easily.
Lastly, pour the vial of blood onto the altar block.
The bone staff you recieve shall serve you for eternity.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests25.sub: It is too late to turn back now.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests26.sub: You have acquired the Frozen Key, congratulations.
ftbquests.chapter.cataclysm.quests26.des: Next thing to do is to find a Frozen Chest.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.title: Caupona
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.subtitle: Greco-roman style food cuisine and utility. Quest tree is a work in progress!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests0.subtit: Caupona's guidebook to your food journey.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests0.descri: Caupona makes heavy use of clay for its cookware! Be sure to get some while you have the chance.
The guidebook also serves as really good documentation, please use it!
As usual, recipes can be seen via &7REI&r or &2JEI&r.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests0.tasks1: Click me to reveal the rest of the quest tree.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests1.title: The Portable Brazier
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests1.subtit: Want to cook on the go? This is for you!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests2.title: Introduction to Stew and Soup Making - The Stewing Pot
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests2.subtit: Make sure to have lots of water!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests2.descri: Next thing to make is the stove.
Once you have the stove made (in the next quest node) simply &bShift + right click&r to place the Stew Pot on top of whatever stove you decided to craft.
A hint is provided on the next page on how to make a Stock base so you don't have to figure out all the proportions...
Place the following items into the Stew Pot:
This was only tested with Egg Drop Soup buut you can put 3 eggs afterward in the Stew Pot grid and begin cooking. This will be recognized as Egg Drop Soup with a Stock base.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests3.title: Caupona Basics - Stoves
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests3.subtit: You will obviously need a heat source.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests3.descri: Accepted fuel types are coal and logs, simply place into the slot!
Pay attention to the proportions of ingredients and what is not accepted for the recipe.
If it says &o&l&dMajority&r of a certain ingredient, then make sure there are more of those ingredients in the Stew Pot grid.
If it says &o&l&cRejects&r of a certain ingredient or ingredients, then make sure there are &l&4none&r of those ingredients in the Stew Pot grid.
You may have to go through a few tabs if you are using &7REI&r/&2JEI&r in order to view the stew and soup recipes. It's called the &aCook Stew/Soup&r recipe category.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests4.title: Resting Pot - The Dolium
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests4.subtit: How stew and soup turn into aspic, a solidified gelatinous form.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests4.descri: Leave &estock&r based soup in the Dolium and let it rest in order for it to turn into &6aspic&r.
Soup and stew made with &9Nail Soup&r will not turn into aspic!
However, aspic is not the only item that can be created with this method.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests5.title: Introduction to Frying Foods
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests5.subtit: Like frying food? These are for you!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests5.descri: There's the &7Stone Gridle&r but it is inefficient with heat transfer, so cooking times are expected to be longer with it.
I suggest making the &6Copper Frying Pan&r or the &8Iron Frying Pan&r as soon as possible.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests6.title: Better Heat Conduction!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests7.title: Acquiring Oil - The Gravy Boat
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests7.descri: Collect 8 or more &6Walnuts&r and place them into a &oDolium&r with an &7Anvil&r in any of the three slots.
Afterwards, simply wait a long time with a glass bottle placed in the bowl slot. Eventually, the glass bottle will be turned into a Gravy Boat.
Gravy Boats are used for providing oil to any adjacent frying pans regardless of what direction it is facing, so have some counter space available!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests8.title: Chimneys and Soot!
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests8.subtit: Soot can be collected from your cooking setups.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests8.descri: Just make sure to place the chimney vent above the stew pot with a one block air gap in between, then place the chimney vent pot on top of the chimney vent.
There's more block palettes than the Brick palette and they are conveniently grouped if you have &7REI&r installed.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests9.title: Growing Wisdom from Bathing
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests9.subtit: Relax in your heated pool and continuously ponder.
ftbquests.chapter.caupona.quests9.descri: I'm being serious. If you relax in the &6heated&r &9water&r you will slowly accumulate &aexperience&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: Age of Creation
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.title: The Andesite Age
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.subtitl: Andesite Alloy is the foundational material of Create.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.descrip: Upon completing this quest node, a Clipboard will be rewarded. Hopefully you can make use of it to keep track of what to do!
So you made your very first &7Andesite Alloy&r ingot, what do you do now?
If FTB Quests is not showing you the recipe for &7Andesite Alloy&r, press R while your cursor is hovered over it.
Make another &7Andesite Alloy&r and make a Shaft and get some planks and make a &3Water Wheel&r.
&3Water Wheels&r are Create's &aearly game&r power source and will help you get started.
If you are wondering how to make &7Andesite Casing&r, it's a simple task... Simply &6right click&r a &l&9stripped log&r&r with an &7Andesite Alloy&r in your hand.
&7Andesite Casing&r is extremely useful and is an important ingredient for many of Create's items, so be sure to always have spares!
Begin the Andesite Age. Click me to claim your rewards!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.rewards: Use me as your To-Do list to help you remember things!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.title: Make the Depot
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.subtitl: Convenient for holding items so they don't despawn.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.descrip: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Please note that it is not required to use a Depot with a Mechanical Press to press ingots into sheets! It's just to prevent items from spawning in case you forget about them.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.title: Create some Andesite Casing
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.subtitl: Very important material. Plus it looks nice! Don't mind the pun.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.descrip: To make Andesite Casing, strip any log with your axe. Once the log is stripped, right click with Andesite Alloy in your main hand.
This process can be automated of course, with a Mechanical Saw and Deployer setup, but we'll get into that later.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.title: Bonk!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.subtitl: The Mechanical Press is very useful, trust me on this.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.descrip: The Mechanical Press has a very involved recipe tree, so expect to use it a lot.
In case you didn't see this the first time: You don't need to use the Depot to press ingots into sheets. It's just to prevent items from despawning in the first place.
Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.title: Mixing Foundations
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.subtitl: Create the Basin, an integral component for the Mechanical Mixer.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.title: The Mixer
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.descrip: The Mechanical Mixer has a very involved recipe tree, expect to use it very frequently!
Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.descrip: If you need to make things &brotate faster&r, use the large coghweel to small cogwheel gear ratio.
If you need to make things &arotate slower&r, use the small cogwheel to large cogwheel gear ratio.
This is explained in the Ponder tutorial for Create's cogwheels.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests7.descrip: If you need to make things &brotate faster&r, use the large coghweel to small cogwheel gear ratio.
If you need to make things &arotate slower&r, use the small cogwheel to large cogwheel gear ratio.
This is explained in the Ponder tutorial for Create's cogwheels.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.subtitl: An easy but weak source of rotational power.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.descrip: As of Create 0.5.1, Water Wheels now output &3256su&r at &a8 RPM&r.
Covering additional sides will &lnot&r give you additional &3su&r or speed. Soul sand also no longer increases speed.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests9.subtitl: Basic rotational force transfer in a straight line.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests9.descrip: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests12.subtit: A useful ingredient for logic components and more.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests14.title: Make some belts!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests14.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Conveyor belts are essential if you want to transport items or want a cheaper alternative to Chain Drives for transferring rotational power (Su) over long distances.
You can also decorate them with Andesite and Brass Casing blocks by right clicking.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests15.title: Introduction to Item Transportation
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests15.subtit: Dried kelp is food, but it's also a material.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests15.descri: Keep some spare dried kelp so you can make your Mechanical Belts!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests16.descri: Step 1: Find a Nether Fortress in the Nether
Step 3: Right click either the Blaze spawner or a Blaze with an Empty Blaze Burner.
Step 4: Enjoy your sentient fireplace! Did I mention that they can drive Create's trains too?
Thanks to the existence of Ruined Nether Portals, you can acquire Empty Blaze Burners without going to the Nether.
Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests17.subtit: You will need more for other purposes.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests17.descri: Blaze Burners are a very reliable heat source.
Click on the recipe then Hold [w] while hovering on the Blaze Burner to Ponder to learn more.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests18.title: Beginning of the Brass Age
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests18.subtit: Making some brass requires some setup...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests19.subtit: An easy method of routing shafts vertically if you rotate them with a Wrench.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests20.title: The Chain Drive Family - Encased Chain Drive
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests20.subtit: Far more flexible than Mechanical Belts in terms of relaying kinetic energy.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests20.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Unlike Mechanical Belts which can't rotate mid-way or at the endpoints, Encased Chain Drives do just that.
They are also not limited by the default 20 block range that Mechanical Belts do.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests21.title: The Chain Drive Family - Adjustable Chain Gearshift
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests21.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Adjustable Chain Gearshifts only apply their RPM adjustment when powered either by a Lever or an Analog Lever.
An Analog Lever is preferred for fine tuning while normal Levers are preferred for applying maximum adjustment.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests22.title: Intelligent Item Transportation and Management - Brass Tunnels
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests22.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
They can merge multiple lines of belts and also distribute items from one belt into many. Their distribution method can also be modified by looking at their tops!
They also can utilize &7List Filters&r and &6Attribute Filters&r and can use items as their item filter. Just right click their filter slot with a filter or item in your hand.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests23.title: Shifting Gears
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests23.descri: Gearshifts are useful for reversing the direction of rotational power.
Typically you would use Gearshifts for retracting a Mechanical Piston, Gantry or reversing the direction of a Mechanical Bearing, reversing the direction of Mechanical Belts...
I can't tell you &levery&r situation this can be used in.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests24.title: Shifting Gears in Sequence
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests24.subtit: The smart and precise Sequenced Gearshift.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests25.title: The Brass Age
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests26.title: Intelligent Item Transportation and Management - Brass Funnels
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests26.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Brass Funnels have the ability to select EXACT amounts or allowed UP TO a certain amount of items permitted to be extracted or received from their attached inventory.
They also can utilize &7List Filters&r and &6Attribute Filters&r and can use items as their item filter. Just right click their filter slot with a filter or item in your hand.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests27.title: Filtered Vertical Item Transfer - Smart Chutes
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests27.descri: Smart Chutes have an inventory size of 64 and have the ability to filter items, just not in specific quantities.
Chutes below a connected Smart Chute at the top will also accept a stack size of 64, as long as the items are received through a Smart Chute at the top.
If you saw kuantities previously, my Q key was broken.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests28.title: Basic Vertical Item Transfer - Chutes
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests28.descri: Did you know you can use &7Encased Fans&r to push items up or pull items up?
Just depends on which end of the Chute you place the Encased Fan in and what direction it is rotating.
You can use &eEngineer's Goggles&r to look at a Chute and the tooltip will let you know if items are being pushed down, pushed up or pulled up.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests29.title: Giant Connected Inventories - Behold! The Item Vault!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests29.subtit: Think of it as a very large chest that can be transported to places.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests29.descri: Want to know a fun fact that most people don't know yet? It's that Item Vaults are &lcompletely&r &6blast proof&r. Very secure storage.
Use it on Create's Trains, make a rotating Item Vault wheel... the limit is your imagination.
They can also be used for instant item transportation in certain scenarios.
Trains do not consume fuel inside Item Vaults!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests30.title: Contraption Actors - Saws, Harvesters, Ploughs!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests30.subtit: Essential for cutting trees, harvesting crops or cleaning up tracks!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests30.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests31.title: Complex Curiosities - Create a Precision Mechanism
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests31.descri: The &ePrecision Mechanism&r is used in multiple gadgets and is also needed for &6Mechanical Arms&r and the &6Rotation Speed Controller&r.
Right click the item in the JEI recipe window to see all the recipes that it is used in.
The following gadgets use the Precision Mechanism:
- This is quite a strong gadget, just be sure to make a &3Copper&r / &8Netherite&r Backtank beforehand and fill it up with air by giving it rotational force.
- Extends player reach by a total of 10 blocks. Like the Potato Cannon, be sure to make a &3Copper&r / &8Netherite&r Backtank beforehand.
- Can be used for building with perfect symmetry or excavating large areas. Very useful!
An explanation for the Sequenced Assembly recipe is on the next page.
Firstly, you will need exactly &lthree&r &eDeployers&r and preferrably a &7Mechanical Belt&r line already laid out to send a Golden Sheet through the following sequence:

This sequence needs to be repeated exactly 5 times, so you will need 5 of each item. You can always bring the Incomplete Precision Mechanism back to the start, but this process can be automated. To automate returning the Incomplete Precision Mechanism back to the start of the sequence, you can:
- Use a &eWeighted Ejector&r to toss it back to the start from the end of the sequence.

- Use an &9Item Vault&r with the Brass Funnel's item filter set to only accept Incomplete Precision Mechanisms on the ending part of the sequence and an Andesite Funnel set to OUTPUT mode on the beginning part of the sequence. This method is instant item transportation.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests32.title: Analytical Vision - Engineer's Goggles
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests32.subtit: It really helps you see Create related info at all times!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests32.descri: When wearing this either in your Head Curios slot or Helmet Slot (not recommended for obvious protection reasons) your Jade tooltip on the top left corner will now display additional useful information when looking at Create related blocks and meters!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests33.title: Long Distance Item Transportation - The Weighted Ejector
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests33.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Weighted Ejectors are great for throwing items long distances or in tight corners. They can also be configured to eject a specified stack size.
By default they have a maximum range of 32 blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests34.title: Fluid Transportation Pt.1 - Fluid Pipe
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests34.descri: You can right click using a &6Wrench&r to open a window on the pipe or to make it not connect with adjacent fluid pipes.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests35.title: Fluid Transportation Pt.2 - Mechanical Pump
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests35.descri: Paired with Fluid Pipes, Mechanical Pumps can extract honey from beehives without angering the bees.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests36.title: Mass Fluid Storage - Fluid Tanks
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests37.title: A Heart of Steam
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests37.subtit: The strongest source of rotational power.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests37.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
The max dimensions of a Steam Boiler are 3x3 with a height of 8 blocks, not including the Blaze Burners.
You should have 1x Blaze Burner after completing the quest for it from the right side region of this chapter space, which is why 8x Blaze Burners are only being requested.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests38.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Mechanical Arms may be slow in your eyes, but they are able to deposit directly into Basins without the use of Andesite or Brass funnels.
They can also reach then take and deposit fuel for your Blaze Burners that sit under your boiler precisely. It's neat!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests39.descri: Used in making the Deployer and Extendo Grip in base Create.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests40.title: Craft the Spout
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests40.descri: You can fully automate potions after being brewed with a Mechanical Mixer.
Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests41.title: Beginning of the Logistics Age
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests41.subtit: Begin the age of the train network.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests41.descri: There is quite a bit to get into, so remember to <rainb>Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!</rainb>
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests41.tasks1: Make a lot of tracks, you'll need them.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests42.title: Casually Crushed Obsidian
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests42.subtit: Powdered Obsidian is an important component to Sturdy Sheets.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests43.title: Create the Crushing Wheels
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests43.descri: You can use two gearboxes with a shaft in between to make them rotate opposite directions to be able to crush stuff.
Also, you can place them horizontally to be able to be used in a production line.
Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests44.title: Mechanical Crafter Power!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests44.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
They also have the power to compress the fabric of the universe, mechanically.
You will see what I mean later.
Have air gaps in recipes? Use a &6Crafter Slot Cover&r to cover those spots.
Need to connect Mechanical Crafter inventories? Use a &6Wrench&r on the &lback&r of each Mechanical Crafter that needs to be connected and matches the same material needed for the shaped recipe.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests45.title: Very Sturdy Sheets
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests45.subtit: The material for everything train related.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests46.title: Train Management
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests46.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests47.title: Train Controls and Scheduling
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests47.subtit: Well, what did you expect? You need controls!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests47.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
You will also need TWO of them for bi-directionality on your trains. One oriented forwards and one oriented backwards.
You will also need someone to drive your trains... why not assign one of your blazes to be the train conductor?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests48.title: Sticky Utilities - Super Glue and the Sticker
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests48.subtit: These utilities allow you to move ENTIRE structures.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests48.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Super Glue has been reworked since 0.5.0 and allows you to have super glued selections that can traverse multiple blocks with one right click.
The Sticker block can be used in conjunction with the Rope Pulley to lift structures! If your imagination is lacking, I'll just say this:
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests49.title: The Humble Millstone
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests49.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Create's Millstones are very good at refining things.
You can even get 2-3 sugar for each sugar cane processed!
Keep in mind Millstones can only process 1 item at a time. Crushing Wheels on the other hand can process entire stacks.
Millstones are also unable to process ore blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests50.title: Wheat Refinement
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests50.subtit: Wheat can be now be refined further.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests50.descri: Wheat flour can be used to make Bread in two ways.
You have the option of using 3 wheat flour in one Basin filled with 1,000mb of Water to make Dough, but the water is consumed in this process.
The other method is using Bulk Washing on the Wheat Flour on a moving Mechanical Belt production line.
Just keep in mind that additional Encased Fans aimed at the same block is the only way of speeding up this process.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests51.title: Homemade Slime
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests51.subtit: Create some slimeballs using the dough you created from earlier.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests51.descri: Did you know Sea Pickles placed on living coral blocks when given bone meal will grow more of themselves?
They also directly give you Lime Dye which is used in the creation of Slime Balls.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests52.title: Making Wind Pt.2 - Encased Fans
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests52.descri: Encased Fans are very useful for a lot of things. Just be careful not to have another Encased Fan unintentionally cooling off your uncooked beef!
Hold [w] to Ponder and see how to use them.
Nozzles can be used to blow entities away in front of the fan in all directions instead of just in a straight line directly in front of the fan.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests53.title: Baker's Passion
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests53.descri: What do you do to Dough in real life? You bake it.
You bake it automatically by using a Campfire in front of an Encased Fan.
&c&lDO NOT USE <shake>LAVA</shake> TO BAKE YOUR DOUGH!&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests54.title: Electron Tube - Part 1
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests54.subtit: Looks like it needs to be polished first before it can be used...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests54.descri: Time to get to polishing with your Sand Paper!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests55.title: Electron Tube - Part 2
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests55.subtit: An important component for smarter things.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests56.title: Craft some Sandpaper
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests56.subtit: The first step in making Electron Tubes.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests56.descri: Hold [Shift] for a summary on how to use.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests57.title: Create an Electron Tube
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests57.subtit: Computers took up entire buildings previously.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests58.title: Contraption Fluid Storage Management - Portable Fluid Interface
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests58.subtit: Contraption fluid inventory output and input.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests58.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
To extract or pump in fluids from a contraption, you must use a Fluid Pipe connected to the stationary Portable Fluid Interface and have a few Mechanical Pumps.
Be sure to craft TWO as well since one PFI is going to be stationary while the other is going to be moving about on the contraption.
It is also very important to leave a one or two block AIR gap between the PFIs so they can interface correctly. Blocks do not obstruct their ability to connect with each other.
As of 0.5.1 Mechanical Pumps can't be reversed, so think of a creative solution involving two Fluid Valves to control which Mechanical Pump is used.
This quest node will award you with one PFI so you can have a total of two in your inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests59.title: Contraption Item Inventory Management - Portable Storage Interface
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests59.subtit: Contraption item inventory output and input.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests59.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
The Portable Storage Interface must have a Funnel or a Chute / Smart Chute attached to it to be able to export from or import to a contraption's inventory.
Be sure to craft TWO as well since one PSI is going to be stationary while the other is going to be moving about on the contraption.
It is also very important to leave a one or two block AIR gap between the PSIs so they can interface correctly. Blocks do not obstruct their ability to connect with each other.
This quest node will award you with one PSI so you can have a total of two in your inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests60.title: Basic Item Transportation and Management - Andesite Funnels
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests60.subtit: The basic funnel with no filtering capabilities. Can only manage 1 item at a time.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests60.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Redstone can also be used to disable funnels from receiving or exporting items.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests61.title: Basic Item Transportation and Management - Andesite Tunnels
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests61.subtit: Takes a stack of items and splits off exactly 1 item into an adjacent Mechanical Belt.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests61.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
It can also be used as decoration, if needed.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests62.subtit: This is what holds multiple minecarts together.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests63.subtit: A required component for the Mechanical Mixer.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests64.title: Making Wind Pt.1 - Propeller
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests64.subtit: How am I supposed to create wind?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests65.title: Fluid Extracton and Filling - Hose Pulley
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests65.subtit: The key to extracting infinite amounts of fluids.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests65.descri: In order for a body of fluid to be considered &d<shake>infinite</shake>&r it has to be 10,000 blocks in volume and some additional blocks because it can't be exactly 10,000 for some reason.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests66.title: Make the Rope Pulley
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests66.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Example use cases are lowering a whole platform of Mechanical Drills for excavating an entire chunk.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests67.title: Windmill Basics
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests67.subtit: A single windmill can provide a maximum of 8192 Su which is quite a lot.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests67.descri: Did I mention they can independently rotate by themselves and serve as your rotary wheat farm without any external help?
Just be sure to keep the speed down, you don't want the Windmill Bearing to break space time and reality, do you?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests68.title: The Strongest Breeze
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests68.subtit: The amount of Sail Frames required for a maximum strength Windmill...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests69.subtit: Very versatile in mining blocks and highly dependent on rotation speed.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests69.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
This can break mostly everything, including wood and cactus blocks.
Just make sure you are using Mechanical Saws instead for automating a tree farm as they are unique in their full tree harvest mechanic.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests70.title: Engineer's Tools - The Wrench
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests70.descri: Used for rotation and adjustment of certain blocks. Also allows direct inventory pickup on Shift + Right click while looking at a Create related block.
Hold [Shift] for a summary on how to use.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests71.title: Branching Out
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests71.subtit: Most Create items provide helpful info when you press and hold W or Shift for extensive tooltips.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests71.descri: There is so much depth to &6Create&r, it is very difficult to fully document in both a text format and a progression tree.
I highly recommend fully watching the &7Ponder&r tutorials for every item to increase your understanding.
Hopefully you find yourself enlightened with how much you can do with Create, despite how \"inefficient\" it is compared to other tech mods.
Remember to &6Hold [w] to Ponder&r or &6Hold [Shift] for more info&r!
Please thoroughly watch them and don't skim through. You can also click the buttons below to identify individual blocks or to slow down the mini tutorial.
Remember that Zinc itself is not renewable in vanilla Create... but this isn't vanilla Create.
Zinc is renewable in this modpack.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests72.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Also Hold [Shift] to learn more on certain items in this quest node.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests73.title: The Copper Age
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests73.subtit: Acquire some basic Copper Age materials.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests73.descri: Fun Fact: Copper Casing can be used to encase Fluid Pipes to make them maintain their shape.
This does mean you can make them stay in an L shape if needed. Copper Casing also allows separation from adjacent Fluid Pipes, just make sure the pipes are not connected before encasing them.
Copper Valve Handles are great for turning at very specific angle intervals. Use them on Fluid Valves or open doors that use a Mechanical Bearing at specific angles.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests74.title: Wireless Redstone - Redstone Link
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests75.title: Looking Inside Inventories - Smart Observer
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests75.subtit: The mechanical eye that reveals the soul.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests75.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests76.title: Quantifying Inventories - Threshold Switch
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests76.subtit: The mechanical eye that monitors for emptiness or fullness.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests76.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
An example use case for the Threshold Switch is stopping production when an Item Vault reaches a certain threshold of space used.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests77.title: Wireless Data Transmission - Display Link
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests77.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
The Display Link can receive information from &eSmart Observers&r, &eThreshold Switches&r, &6Brass Tunnels&r, &6Funnels&r, etc.
However, it needs to &otransmit&r the information somewhere, right? That's where &bDisplay Boards&r and &bNixie Tubes&r come in.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests78.title: Big Ben
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests79.subtit: Use this for rotating large doors, contraptions...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests79.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Mechanical Bearings are typically used for rotating large structures like a super glued wall that serves as one half for your door...
It can also rotate a large arm carrying a mass of basins among other things.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests80.title: Moving Giant Walls and Chunks - The Mighty Mechanical Piston
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests80.subtit: Flex on your friends who still use vanilla pistons!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests80.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
It just does not get any smoother than this.

Unlike regular Pistons which retracted when not receiving power, Mechanical Pistons will need to be retracted with rotational force in the &4opposite&r direction used for extending. A &cGearshift&r is helpful for achieving this easily!
Please note that Mechanical Pistons can't extend without at least &lone&r &7Extension Rod&r attached!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests81.title: Easy Speed Control - Rotation Speed Controller
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests81.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
The Rotation Speed Controller allows you to change the rotation speed very easily.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests82.title: Wireless Redstone - Linked Controller
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests82.subtit: Allows you to send signals right from your hand!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests82.descri: Can also be placed on a Lectern, so you can use it to control a crane to pick up and lower Item Vaults from a parked train, door powered by Sequenced Gearshifts, etc.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests83.title: A Trip to Hell
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests84.title: Find a Nether Fortress
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests84.subtit: It has valuables, but you're looking for a Blaze spawner.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests84.descri: Please do not break the first blaze spawner you see!
You can make an unlimited amount of Blaze Burners from a single blaze spawner.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests85.title: Capture a Blaze
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests85.subtit: Just right click the Blaze or Blaze Spawner with your Empty Blaze Burner.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests85.descri: &oYes&r you can get an infinite amount of Blaze Burners from a single blaze spawner, so guard it well!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests85.tasks0: Right click the Blaze with the Empty Blaze Burner
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests86.title: Bread!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests86.descri: Congratulations, you have made more bread than you usually do thanks to the power of the Millstone.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests87.title: Engineer's Inventory - The Toolbox
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests87.descri: Hold [Shift] for a summary on how to use the Toolbox.
Has a default maximum range of 10 blocks.
Hold left &e[Alt]&r to open the Toolbox interface and move your mouse to change selection.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests88.title: Take a Seat!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests88.descri: Safety should be your priority when riding your contraptions.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests89.title: The Black Seat
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests89.subtit: A seat fit for a conductor.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests90.title: Craft the Item Drain
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests90.subtit: Useful if you want to drain buckets from a milk farm, lava farm and more.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests90.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Did you know a Basin can directly spout fluid into an Item Drain?
This bypasses the need to use the Smart Fluid Pipe as you could right click the Basin's recipe filter with a Chocolate Bucket to filter it out.
However, for potion making you will need to set a recipe filter first beforehand.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests91.title: Redstone Latches
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests91.descri: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
The powered toggle latch can be used to reverse a gantry's or mechanical piston's direction when it reaches one end with the help of redstone contacts.

Upon reaching one end, the redstone contact will send a signal to the powered toggle patch which will either turn off or on the redstone wiring connected to the gearshift. This does heavily depend on your setup, however.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests92.title: Behold! The Power of Visualization!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests93.title: Useful Gadgets - The Potato Cannon
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests93.subtit: A toy, a very powerful toy.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests93.descri: The &6Potato Cannon&r is actually a very strong weapon.
Simply enchant it with a &dPower V&r or higher and use food items as ammo. Don't worry, if the food item is unusable as ammunition, it simply won't consume the food item.
Make sure to use a &6Copper&r / &8Netherite&r Backtank for safe operation with no risk for durability loss!
See the next page for some common ammunition types and their effects. I won't list the rest however as that is for you to <rainb>try them and see</rainb>.
High damage, sets targets on fire.
Average damage output, sets targets on fire.
Splits into three projectiles, low damage output.
Splits into two projectiles and applies the Glowing effect to targets.
Applies the effects of the Golden Apple and cures Zombie Villagers. Not intended as damaging ammunition.
Applies Enchanted Golden Apple effects but can't cure Zombie Villagers. Not intended as damaging ammunition.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests94.title: Useful Gadgets - The Wand of Symmetry
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests94.descri: The &6Wand of Symmetry&r is a very useful tool, make use of it when building structures!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests95.title: Useful Gadgets - Extendo Grip
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests95.descri: Both an architect's and engineer's best friend for reaching long distances.
Make sure to use a &6Copper&r / &8Netherite&r Backtank for safe operation with no risk for durability loss!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests96.title: Create the Peculiar Bell
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests96.subtit: Does it feel peculiar to you?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests97.title: The Haunted Bell
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests97.subtit: I shall show you where the souls of the damned appear o' wise one.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests97.descri: You can also hold the &3&l&o<wiggle>haunted</wiggle>&r bell in your offhand to see where mobs have the possibility of spawning.
This is indicated by &3souls&r rising up from the top face of a block.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests98.title: Gone diving!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests98.descri: Want to swim and work underwater freely? Then this gear is for you!
The Copper Backtank is important for having an air supply. To refill it, place the Copper Backtank under a fast spinning Shaft.
Just keep in mind if you want to ascend quickly, take of your Diving Boots.
Capacity of the Backtank can be increased by enchanting it with Capacity enchantment books.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests99.title: Lava Diving!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests99.subtit: Gone swimming in the lava oceans of the Nether.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests99.descri: The Netherite Diving gear can only grant full lava immunity when your backtank is filled with SOME pressurized air.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests100.title: Water Wheels, upgraded!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests100.descr: Here is some helpful information that you will probably skip over:
Large Waterwheels output the maximum of &3512su&r at &a4 RPM&r.
Covering additional sides will &lnot&r give you additional &3su&r or speed. Soul sand also no longer increases speed.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests101.title: Elevators Elevators Elevators!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests101.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests102.title: Terraforming with Trains - The Mechanical Roller
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests102.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Mechanical Rollers are extremely useful when it comes to clearing the way for your new train network.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests103.subti: This has many uses, trust me.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests103.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Notice: This quest node is a required dependency for &eElevator Pulleys&r from the &eBrass Age&r.
Redstone Contacts paired with a Powered Toggle Latch can be utilized to make a Mechanical Piston or Gantry rotate in reverse with the help of a Gearshift.
They can also be used with the Elevator Pulley to designate floors.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests104.title: Fluid Management and Filtering - Smart Fluid Pipe
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests104.subti: If you want to be very specific about fluid filtration.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests104.descr: Smart Fluid Pipes allow you to filter what fluid you want from a Basin very easily.
An example use case would be automated brewing and having to extract the initial potion fluid from the resulting potion fluid.
This also applies to making chocolate since the Basin would contain both the Milk and Chocolate fluids.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests105.title: Pulse Repeater
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests105.subti: The most compact and adjustable redstone clock!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests105.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
What takes up so much space or requires the use of hoppers can now be achieved with less space taken.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests106.title: Pulse Extender
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests106.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests107.title: The Deployer...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests107.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
It is a perfect reflection of yourself, condensed into the form of a brass hand.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests108.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests109.title: Contraption Actors Management - Contraption Controls
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests109.subti: Mechanical Rollers breaking everything? I take care of that.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests109.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Right click the filter on the Contraption Controls block with a contraption actor block in hand such as the following:

Upon pressing the button, you can toggle the state of the contraption actor specified in the filter to be &aENABLED&r or &cDISABLED&r which can be very useful for trains and minecart contraptions so they don't accidentally break their tracks.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests110.title: Make Seats for your Passengers!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests110.subti: You don't want them defying space and time, do you?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests111.title: Spin...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests111.subti: me right round baby right round...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests111.descr: This is self-explanatory so you probably don't need to [Shift] for more info...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests112.title: Fancy Doors and Trapdoors
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests112.descr: Train Doors exist, but that's for later.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests113.title: Fancy Train Doors
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests114.title: The Placard
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests114.subti: An elegant way to showcase an item.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests115.title: Create Utilities - The Mighty List Filter
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests115.subti: Need to filter your items? Use me!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests115.descr: With the item you want to either whitelist or blacklist in your inventory, place it into the available slots. The item is not consumed!
You can also use the List Filter in the recipe filter on Basins to allow certain items to be made or on Smart Fluid Pipes to extract certain fluids directly from the Basin or Fluid Tank.
You can also put List filters inside List Filters.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests116.title: Create Utilities - The Attribute Filter
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests116.subti: Allows you to filter items by attribute.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests116.descr: Let's say you want to make a funnel accept all items tagged with &b#forge:ingots&r to accept all smelted results from a bulk blasting setup made with Encased Fans... this is exactly what you would use the Attribute Filter for!

The same also applies to setting the &6Brass Funnel&r that's used for giving the &eMechanical Arms&r to dump the items into the &7Encased Fan&r bulk blasting furnace setup and can be set to accept all raw ores as well.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests117.title: Create Utilities - The Crafting Blueprint
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests117.subti: Tired of clicking and dragging items to craft something? I got you covered!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests117.descr: To &cremove&r a stored recipe from a Crafting Blueprint, just crouch and then punch it exactly &lONCE&r. If you accidentally punch more than once, the blueprint will be taken off the wall.

Also, Crafting Blueprints can't be moved with their stored recipes still intact. My advice to you is try not to move them around too much and make sure you establish an area where you will frequently be using them.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests118.title: Keeping Track of Time - Cuckoo Clock
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests118.subti: Makes sounds throughout the day, letting you know what time it is.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests119.title: Visualizing Rotational Force - The Speedometer and Stressometer
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests119.subti: Fancy meters that give useful information!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests119.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Having trouble determining what &bspeed&r your cogwheels are rotating?
Having trouble determining how many &3stress units&r are being produced?
Also, if you want to change your Speedometer into a Stressometer and vice versa, simply put it in your crafting grid to change what it reads.
When wearing Engineer's Goggles, they provide numerical information.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests120.title: Fluid Management - Fluid Valve
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests120.subti: Need to prevent other fluids from going through temporarily? I got you covered!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests121.title: Gantries Galore!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests121.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
Fun Fact: Gantries behave like worm gears when powered by redstone!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests122.title: Basic Rotational Force - The Humble Hand Crank
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests122.descr: Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!
If you don't have the materials to make a Water Wheel or want to manually provide rotational force, the Hand Crank is what you would use.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests123.title: Create Utilities - Tree Fertilizer
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests123.descr: This stuff grows your plants and trees &l&o<rainb>instantly</rainb>&r, so it's best that you automate this for future usage!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests124.title: Create Utilities - Blaze Cakes
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests124.descr: Blaze Cakes are multi-purpose. They are used for feeding your Blaze Burners so they can go into a &bsuperheated&r state in addition to being one of the strongest ammunition items for the &6Potato Cannon&r.
What are &bsuperheated&r Blaze Burners used for?
- Unlocking new &o&2compacting&r and &o&2mixing&r recipes that involve the &7Basin&r.
- Providing more heat to your &7Steam Boiler&r so it can support powering 18 &6Steam Engines&r in total.
You can right click the &eBlaze Cake&r item in the items entry to see all the recipes that require a &bsuperheated&r Blaze Burner.
At this point of progression, you are expected to be able to automate this fully. Helpful advice is on the next page.
Step 1: Automate egg collection from chickens as well as sugar production from sugar cane. Sugar can be refined by &eMillstones&r and &eCrushing Wheels&r for significantly better yields!

Step 2: Automate &4Cinder Flour&r production either from a Nether drill quarry or making Netherrack with a Spout containing &cHealing II&r. Automating Healing II potion creation might be quite a trip!

Step 3: Automate Lava collection. You can either do this with a Nether train system as you can easily find a lava lake that can satisfy the Bottomless Supply requirement of 10,000 source blocks. Use a &6Hose Pulley&r and start extracting while looking at it with &eEngineer's Goggles&r to verify this.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests125.title: The Other Cuckoo Clock
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests125.descr: It might be a ticking time bomb, maaaaaybe.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests126.title: Create Utilities - The Copper Valve Handle
ftbquests.chapter.create_cafe.title: Create Cafe
ftbquests.chapter.create_cafe.subtitle: Work in progress.
ftbquests.chapter.create_cafe.quests2.de: Want to feel the effects of caffiene for a while? Automate this!
I'm aware that the tooltip suggests &910 seconds&r, but it was increased to &9300 seconds&r in &bserverconfig&r.
So... you maaay have to copy it over from &ddefaultconfigs&r if you are playing from an older version of the modpack like pre &e0.1.4e&r.
Go open modpack's instance directory and copy the &dcreatecafe-server.toml&r file from the &bdefaultconfigs&r folder and paste it into your world's &aserverconfig&r folder.
If you can't locate your world saves, they are inside the &dsaves&r folder and use the same name that you typed in on world creation.
ftbquests.chapter.create_delicacies.ques: Simply pour some honey with a Spout onto an Apple to make one Honeyed Apple.
