ftbquests.chapter.intro_to_singularity.s: This chapter serves both as an introduction and some awareness of utilities.
ftbquests.chapter.intro_to_singularity.q: Introduction Node - Hi! Welcome to Finality.
Click me to check the description of this button.
If you wish to play the modpack on its intended difficulty, set the difficulty to &cHard&r. For obvious reasons, this is optional.
Quests on this chapter are not expected to be completed on the first few days.
The rest of the chapters can be accessed after you click the checkmark here and move your cursor to the left edge of your screen.
If you are playing with friends, please do not forget to make a party with FTB Teams! Press E to open your inventory and look for three person figures on the top left corner.
This modpack is not complete and development is ongoing, but the end goal is reachable.
If you wish to disable the immersion and first person model that &l&eReal Camera&r provides, press &6F6&r.
If you wish to configure your character's gender, press &d&lG&r.
Press &bX&r to crawl.
Press &eY&r while your cursor is hovering over an item to find that same item in a nearby chest. White particles will show up inside of it through the walls.
Also, take the time now to SET YOUR KEYBINDS and adjust volume levels if needed.
Tips for using &l&7Roughly Enough Items&r or &l&2JEI&r are on the next few pages. &eLootr&r chest info is on the following page. Just don't say I didn't warn you if your Lootr chest blows up.
&l&7Roughly Enough Items / REI&r &l&aTips and Tricks&r
There's a lot of things to unpack here. Don't forget to scroll!
- &bLeft clicking&r items shows how to get them, with all the methods shown at the top of the recipe viewing window where all those tabs are.
- &3Right clicking&r items shows all the recipes that the item is used in.
- &l&9Fluids&r&r in the recipe viewing area can be &bleft clicked&r to find out how to make them. This especially applies to filling by Create's Spout recipes.
- Press &dCtrl + F&r to focus the search bar then start typing.
- If you want to clear the search bar instantly, do &cCtrl + A&r then press &cBackspace&r.
- To search by mod, use &d@&r then type the modid of that mod. Examples: &d@create&r or &d@createaddition&r or &d@extendedcrafting&r
- To search by tags, use &b$&r then type the item tag you want to look up. Examples: &b$wood&r or &b$minecraft:planks&r
More &l&7REI&r tips are on the next page. If you are looking for &l&2JEI&r related tips they are on the later pages.
&l&7REI&r &l&aTips and Tricks&r &a(continued)&r

- You can &l&bclick and drag&r recipes to the top left region that is highlighted with segmented lines and save them in a sequence to prepare for a long recipe tree. You can then scroll through them while your cursor is in the region. To &l&cremove&r saved recipes, drag them to the bottom left region that is highlighted.
- You can click and drag items to the top left area or press A to bookmark individual items.
- Press A while hovering your cursor on an item to put it in the bookmarks area.
- Press R while hovering your cursor on an item to see recipes on how to make it.
- Press U while hovering your cursor on an item to see where the item is used.
&aJEI Tips and Tricks&r
- &bLeft clicking&r items shows how to get them, with all the methods shown at the top of the recipe viewing window where all those tabs are.
- &3Right clicking&r items shows all the recipes that the item is used in.
- &l&9Fluids&r&r in the recipe viewing area can be &bleft clicked&r to find out how to make them. This especially applies to filling by Create's Spout recipes.
- Press &dCtrl + F&r to focus the search bar then start typing.
- If you want to clear the search bar instantly, do &cCtrl + A&r then press &cBackspace&r.
- To search by mod, use &d@&r then type the modid of that mod. Examples: &d@create&r or &d@createaddition&r or &d@extendedcrafting&r
- To search by tags, use &b$&r then type the item tag you want to look up. Examples: &b$wood&r or &b$planks&r
Tips regarding &eLootr&r chests on the next page:
&l&eLootr&r chests provide a unique instance of loot for each player, so what your friends get can be different from what you get. It is common courtesy not to break them.
- Lootr Chests DO NOT say if they are a trapped chest or not, even with Jade. What does this mean for you?
&l&c<shake>Check for TNT or redstone around each Lootr chest.</shake>&r
Thinking of no longer using Patchouli for the guide book... information below is not relevant until it is more up to date.
If you lose the &5Tome of Finality&r, it is reclaimable from Emergency Items (broken heart icon) on the right. You can also craft the guidebook with two sticks!
However, the book is not finished and won't be for a while. There is some info that isn't present in FTB Quests, however.
You have acknowledged the button.
Introduction to Enigmatic Legacy
Power is a double edged sword, choose wisely.
You may notice in your inventory that you come with two different items... a &4dark ring&r and an &6amulet&r.
The &6Enigmatic Amulet&r keeps &l&oall&r &aexperience&r and &ditems&r on &cdeath&r, just make sure it is in your player's inventory or in the Curios accessories charm slot.
The ring on the other hand is a double edged sword that cuts deeply.
Once you wear the &l&4Ring of the Seven Curses&r, it is bound to you... &ceternally&r.
Keep an eye out for extra shiny loot that may grant you special abilities!
I accept.
Are you sure this is vanilla?
The night is ever so slightly more dangerous, see for yourself.
Certain \"zombies\" are a bit different.
Oh and certain structures may be different, so keep an eye out for that. Also be sure to check around every Lootr chest in case there is TNT!
I don't remember Sugar Cane growing that tall...
Hey, so Apotheosis puts your Sugar Cane, Bamboo and Cactus on steroids.
You're welcome~
Another thing, I have added Apotheosis gem crushing with Create's Millstone and Crushing Wheels, so have fun with making the most over powered tools to ever exist with it. Gem dust galore!
Let's just say my friends during playtesting showed me a shovel that he made deleting entire chunks to prove this fact.
If you are questioning the chanced drops, it's actually because Create assigns a percent to each item in the item stack.
Convenient Utilities Ch.1
No really, they are very convenient.
You can now &arepair&r your tools in the crafting grid, so you won't have to throw away your tools.
If you still find yourself running out of string or wool, gather &2flax seeds&r and plant them. &aFlax&r can then be refined with a &6Millstone&r to get additional string and seeds.
This process can then be automated with &6Create&r and its &7Mechanical Harvesters&r.
Also, if you didn't read the tooltip for &6Campfires&r like the majority of players who skim over &c<shake>everything</shake>&r, they can now regenerate your health. &6<wave>Cozy!</wave>&r
Make sure to make an FTB Teams party to synchronize quest progress!
Convenient Utilities Ch.2
Scientia Consolidationis
Instructions on how to use the Eccentric Tome are located in its tooltip. &b<wave>You're welcome!</wave>&r
As for Farmer's Delight tools, obviously you will need a knife to use the cutting board.
Wondering what chalk can be used for?

It can be used for &ddrawing&r, &eoutlining builds&r, &eoutlining the path&r of a radial contraption farm and help you &bnavigate&r through &7cave systems&r, just in case you get lost. Additional symbols can be unlocked via advancements.
Lastly, Fletching Tables are now usable and can make arrows now thanks to &dApotheosis&r!
Any #farmersdelight:tools/knives
Any #chalk:chalks
Convenient Utilities Ch.3
For all time. Always.
&lThis quest node description has multiple pages that contain information for each item that does not explain its use through a tooltip.&r
Please read through them to learn more.
About Tempad:
Think of the &dTempad&r device as a personal waystone with a cooldown. It is very effective and customizable as well!
This quest also has a hidden step, but it requires you to get to The End first.
About Travel Anchors:
Teleporter elevators, but omni-directional!
&3Travel Anchors&r are very versatile and provide instantaneous travel in any direction with the &3Travel Staff&r.
They are also more reasonably priced compared to OpenBlocks Elevator which use just wool and an ender pearl in the middle.
You can also get the Teleportation enchantment which allows you to utilize your tools as a &3Travel Staff&r.
If you want to increase the range, get the Range enchantment. Just make sure the enchanted book has the Travel Anchors mod ID.
To unlock the &3Travel Anchor&r to rename it, use a stick!
About &eMega Torches&r from Torchmaster:
They prevent spawns in a 64 block radius from their position.
&7Mechanical Extruders&r can be used to make Create's orestones quite easily and can make smooth stone if the recipe filter is set.
The &aCreate Chunk Loader&r makes it so that trains and moving contraptions are able to load chunks themselves instead of using an incompatible stationary chunk loader.
This is the Travel Anchor. You can name it too!
The omni-directional teleportation rod!
He who remains...
...at the End of time.
Unlimited teleports, for all time.
Getting somewhere...
I hope you have at least a base set up by now.
If you're lost, just play as if it is regular Minecraft.
It's just that it is Minecraft with a lot more... &c<wave>dangers</wave>&r.
You may notice that days and nights are longer as well, just so it does not feel like time is flying by.
Also, I recommend making a backpack so you can handle loot more easily while you are out exploring and adventuring. The default keybind for opening your backpack is &dB&r.
Introduction to Create
Creating your foundation...
This is also &overy&r important...
<rainb>Hold [w] to Ponder to learn more!</rainb>
You can also access the <rainb>Ponder Index</rainb> from your Esc menu!
Here are some tips that I recommend following:
- Some <rainb>Ponder</rainb> views have &o&lmultiple scenes&r&r, so be sure to look at the bottom of your screen to see if there is a &lnext arrow&r.
- Andesite, iron, copper and zinc are important. You will especially need andesite and iron.
- Many useless vanilla items may no longer be useless when refined through Create's methods. Gravel can now be &9washed&r to make Iron Nuggets, for example.
- Plan ahead with your logistics and the direction of your rotational force.
Ready to proceed and unlock the Age of Creation? Click me to confirm.
Diamond Pickaxe Acquired!
Be prepared.
Once you complete this quest, a chapter page will be unlocked.
I can only hope that you have made the appropriate preparations for combat.
Useful Guidance
For both explorers and those who seek a certain biome.
The &aNature's Compass&r allows you to find &lbiomes&r.
The &7Explorer's Compass&r allows you to find &lstructures&r.
Introduction to Waystones
Pillars that allow you to teleport anywhere.
For far distance travelling! You'll probably enable cheats anyway.
Just to let you know we have tuned the Waystones to use inverse XP cost.
What that means is that short distance travelling is more expensive than far distance travel.
A Heads Up: Infinite Materials
Worried about running out of materials?
Well, don't be worried about that.
&2Dried Kelp Blocks&r can be compressed to make Coal with the help of an &6active&r Blaze Burner.
&7Coal Blocks&r can be compressed to make Diamonds with the help of a &bsuperheated&r Blaze Burner.
&aEmeralds&r are renewable from mixing some glass, quartz and some iron in a &bsuperheated&r Blaze Burner.
&7Tuff&r can be made from compacting either Gravel or Deepslate in a &bsuperheated&r or &6heated&r &7basin&r with some lava.
&9Phantom Membranes&r can be made from &3<wave>haunting</wave>&r &4Rotten Flesh&r.
&8Netherite&r is also now renewable with the use of Crushing Wheels by crushing &4Netherrack&r.
Netherrack can now be renewed with &cInstant Health II&r potions, fully automated.
Menu Music Discs
Like the menu music? Well, now they are here.
ftbquests.chapter.irons_spells_n_spellbo: Powerful arcane magic! Quest tree is currently a work in progress.
This book will serve as an introduction to the arcane arts.
Early game spell casting utilizes &escrolls&r which are consumed upon use. &l&c<shake>However</shake>&r, it is recommended to save them until you can &binscribe&r them into a &dspell book&r.
When &binscribed&r within a &dspell book&r, the magic spells from the spell book can be used <rainb>infinitely</rainb> instead of being consumed after being used.
While this quest tree is a work in progress, utilize the guide book in the meantime.
Access inscribed spells by pressing &b[Tab]&r. However, you are free to rebind this at any time.
Want to use stronger spells? Make this.
The quality of ink affects the scroll's rarity / level.
These spell books also have additional space for more spells, so craft them as soon as possible.
Late Game Spell Casting - Arcane Anvil
The Arcane Anvil allows you to imbue your armor and weapons with spells.
Have fun turning your enemies into dust!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.title: Lil' Wings
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.subtitle: Butterflies are friendly and helpful!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests0.desc: It's a bit difficult to document all of the information for Lil' Wings as a quest tree, so please use the book in the meantime.
&cDo not kill any butterflies or you will not get anything from them!&r &4You would be considered a <shake>monster</shake> if you do so.&r
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests1.subt: Seek the assistance of a butterfly found in the sunflower plains.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests1.desc: Created with the help of the Buttergold butterfly.
Be sure to have a &6dandelion&r flower on hand to lure them towards you.
When placed in a butterfly jar that is above a cauldron filled with milk, it is slowly churned into butter.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests2.desc: Catch a Swamphopper butterfly to help with this.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests3.subt: Seek the assistance of a butterfly only found in jungle forests.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests3.desc: You are looking for the &8Painted Panther Butterfly&r.
It is dark in appearance and has eyes that seem to have &anight vision&r.
Be sure to have &6cocoa beans&r on hand to lure them towards you.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests4.subt: Seek their assistance from the meadows.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests4.desc: Cloudypuff butterflies can only be found in the meadows.
Be sure to bring a &6campfire&r with you to lure them towards you when it is placed.
Their wings can be used as substitution for &7ghast tears&r in crafting recipes.
They can be housed in butterfly jars, but they will generate clouds around them.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests5.subt: Create your very own butterfly wings!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests6.titl: Cotton Ball - Borrowing Essence from the Butterflies
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests7.titl: Luring Butterflies: Lantern on a Stick
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests7.subt: Butterflies will wander towards you with this!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests8.subt: Seek the assistance of the Crystalpuff butterfly.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests8.desc: &dCrystalpuff butterflies&r can only be found in the flower forests.
Be sure to have some &dlilac&r flowers on hand to lure them towards you!
When inside the butterfly jar, they help amethyst crystals grow faster.
When their wings are combined with diamond, it is converted into &dButternite&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests9.desc: The Golden Cake replenishes more hunger and saturation than the &cVelvet Cake&r in addition to applying a temporary &dregeneration&r and &eabsorption&r effect.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests10.des: Not really special, but it does replenish more hunger and saturation than the regular cake.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests11.des: To place down a butterfly jar, [Shift] + Right click the ground with a glass bottle. Then with a butterfly in your net in your main hand, right click the bottle.
Instead of wandering aimlessly, you can let them help you!
Just like you are giving jobs for Blazes to heat your Basins and doing enchants for you.
Unfortunately you can't give them Engineer's Goggles, they're far too heavy for such fragile creatures.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests13.des: Red Applefly butterflies can only be found in oak forests.
You can lure them towards you using &capples&r, &cred dye&r or &cpoppies&r. Holding redstone will &oscare&r them away.
Their wings can be eaten as if they were apples.
If you happen to have a Block of Gold, place the butterfly jar on top of it and watch them &o<rainb>transform</rainb>&r into &6Gold Applefly butterflies&r.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests14.des: You do not have to lure the &6Gold Applefly butterfly&r towards you as they &o&aalready&r try to follow you &lat all times&r.
When in a butterfly jar, the &6Gold Applefly butterfly&r will provide potion effects to nearby players.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests15.sub: Can only be found around villages.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests15.des: You can lure them towards you with &aseeds&r.
The Swallowtail butterfly helps accelerate crop growth rate when inside the butterfly jar!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests16.sub: Can only be found in big taiga forests.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests16.des: You can lure them towards you with &6brown mushrooms&r.
Once in a butterfly jar, they will convert &cred mushrooms&r into &6brown mushrooms&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests17.sub: Can only be found on mushroom islands.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests17.des: They can be lured towards you with &cred mushrooms&r.
Once in a butterfly jar, they will convert &6brown mushrooms&r into &cred mushrooms&r!
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests18.sub: Only found in the highest frozen peaks.
ftbquests.chapter.lil_wings.quests18.des: You can lure the White Fox butterfly towards you with the &bLily of the Valley flower&r.
When in a butterfly jar, the White Fox butterfly will spawn patches of snow around it.
Its wings can also be converted into &bice&r blocks.

ftbquests.chapter.mystical_agriculture.q: Genesis of Infinity - The Infusion Altar
With Mystical Agriculture, you can make many things. You can even make renewable conduits, hearts of the sea and more.
Does this upset the balance? Yes. Was this modpack intended to be balanced? Nope.
&bRight click&r the &6Infusion Altar&r block in &2JEI&r to see all recipes that involve the crafting method.
Here is an explanation on how to use the &6Infusion Altar&r once you place the &eInfusion Pedestals&r on their assigned locations:
After placing your ingredients accordingly using information from JEI, you can use a button or lever next to the altar to start the process.
Please craft and read through the Mystical Agriculture Guide Book. The documentation within it is quite extensive.
Also, for each tier of essence there are armor pieces and tools for that same tier.
As always, you can right click each type of tiered essence to see what recipes they are used in.
For example, iron is a Tier 3 resource which means you will need to use Tertium Essence to make Iron Seeds. Tiered essences can also be used to enrich the farmland to yield better results.
Use Growth Accelerators under the farmland as well to accelerate the growth process.
Also, if you wish to grow mob essence, use a Soulium Dagger WHILE you have a SOUL JAR in your inventory.
At this point you should have access to the Nether. I suggest making the &6Soulium Dagger&r and making a &6Soul Jar&r in order to grow special mob essence.
You can grow chicken essence right from your mystical garden!
Simply right click on water to fill, it's that simple.
Yes, there are more watering cans after this.
A Crystalline Infinity - The Infusion Crystal
This is needed to start your journey with infinite automation.
You will need to make a special Infusion Fluid to create this very special item.
Once you mix the ingredients together in a Basin, use a Spout to pour the fluid onto a diamond to make the basic Infusion Crystal.
Remember that all the tiers have names.
All tiers except &5Insanium&r have their own tools, armor, growth accelerators, etc.
Mastery - The Master Infusion Crystal and Insanium

The basic premise of Red Power is modernized redstone signal transmission. It does &lnot&r transfer FE!

ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests1.subt: This is how to send redstone power from any vanilla source!
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests2.subt: Upon receiving a signal, the Recorder Node will power the block attached to it.
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests3.subt: This allows you to relay redstone signals.
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests4.subt: The most basic wire type with lots of signal loss.
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests5.desc: Amethyst Wires are special in the fact that they are invisible.
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests10.sub: Don't want to use cobblestone levers? Here's your answer!
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests12.sub: Don't need to make long trails of repeaters anymore!
ftbquests.chapter.red_power.quests12.des: You probably won't even need to use hopper clocks either.

ftbquests.chapter.salt.subtitle: It's literally just salt.

ftbquests.chapter.salt.quests0.subtitle: Salting food has benefits!
ftbquests.chapter.salt.quests0.descripti: Simply acquire some salt then combine it with a food item in your crafting grid to salt said food item.

ftbquests.chapter.salt.quests2.subtitle: It's relatively simple!
ftbquests.chapter.salt.quests2.descripti: Acquire some &6pointed dripstone&r and a &6dripstone block&r.
Place a &9water source block&r on top of the dripstone block with the pointed dripstone placed directly below.
A salt stalagmite should start forming directly under the pointed dripstone as time goes on.
ftbquests.chapter.some_assembly_required: The Foundation of the Art of Sandwiching
This is the first step for making the ULTIMATE sandwich.
Did I mention you can also put potions on your sandwiches too? It's very cool, I just don't know if it will taste good.
Good thing you can't taste things, right?
Make a Tomtato, Cabbage \\& Bacon Sandwich
This is just the beginning. You can probably put all the potions into one huge sandwich stack!
ftbquests.chapter.storage_management.que: Introduction to Storage Management
There are many options for storage.
You are free to utilize whatever storage methods you feel best suit your needs.
&eCreate&r can also be utilized to become your storage management system if you put in the effort of setting up something impressive.
Everything Storage checkmark
Introduction to EnderChests and EnderTanks
These mods are made by shetiphian.
The older Ender Storage mod had some issues when writing new recipes.
To upgrade Ender Chest capacity, right click with either Ender Pearls or Ender Eyes.
To bind Ender Chests or Ender Tanks, right click on them with a Diamond.
Can be upgraded.
Use ender eyes or ender pearls to increase the amount of storage.
Use dyes to color the channels.
Use a diamond to lock it to yourself.
Wireless fluid tanks...
You know what, I might regret this.
It's a mobile ender chest!
An ender chest turned into a bag.
Cloud Storage and You
An introduction to cloud storage.
Cloud Storage... Literally.
Be sure to send some chests to the sky!
Think of the Cloud Chest as an expandable Ender Chest as it is only accessible by you.
If you plan on sharing storage with everyone else, then wait for a &bthunderstorm&r and get some &bstatically&r charged clouds.
Once you have enough &bstatically charged&r clouds gathered craft the &bStatic Cloud Chest&r which is publicly accessible by everyone, as long as they share the same balloon color.
Shocking!
Everyone loves static electricity!
If you are wondering where to get more &bstatic&r cloud blocks, you could get them from the &7Bloviators&r during a &ethunderstorm&r.
Once you acquire some &bstatic&r cloud blocks, right click with any balloon in hand to give it a &bstatic charge&r.
Shareable Cloud Storage - Static Cloud Chest
Mass storage for everyone!
Enjoy your newly created Static Cloud Chest.
Don't forget to send more chests to the sky with balloons that have a static charge on them!
Big Bank
Blastproof and *secure!
Drawers!
Drawers are pretty hefty.
Storage Upgrades

Decoration mods have been added! Search them in JEI like so to view all the blocks available with ItemZoom on the left side of your inventory showing the full block, if applicable.
- Dark Paintings adds new paintings, so you will have to make paintings to see them all.
If you loved using Iron Bars or Gold Bars as walls, here you go!
Have an excessive amount of precious metals? Then these doors are for you!
Gold doors function like normal doors.
Silver doors can't be opened manually.
Lead doors take three clicks to open manually.
Perfect for adding secret Mechanical Piston doors, though it might be useless since Jade reveals all...
Try some of these lamps for your base.
Follows the same functions to their door counterparts.
Something other than torches, plus they look nicer.
Tired of vanilla windows made of glass blocks that don't have connected textures?
Here's your solution! This is but only a small sample of the different types of glass to suit your needs.
You are running out of time. *distorted clock chime*
This is mostly used for decorative purposes.
You can make spooky dark iron decorations with this stuff.
These make it significantly easier to place down walls and large amounts of blocks.
Place a layer of a chunk at a time!
ftbquests.chapter.tale_of_the_seven_curs: To put on the ring, or to not put on the ring?
Upon wearing the ring, this branch will unlock.
You can either choose to walk the path of the cursed or refuse to wear the ring. Your choice.
If you do die, you lose a part of your soul... literally.
Looks like you lost a part of your soul. Better find your soul fragments quick!
Die once while wearing the Ring of the Seven Curses.
The Dust of Space and Time
Those who bear the Seven Curses may obtain this by destroying Shulkers.
Acquire the Heart of the Golem
Acquire the Heart of the Abyss
You feel the abyss stare back at you.
The best thing to do is end it all and leave forever...
Find the Pearl of the Void
A rare treasure... at the end of time.
A gift that is only found in the End.
A shield that can finally extinguish your eternal fire...
You do realize it's a shield made out of fire, right?
This is the only way to destroy the ring, but you do not escape unscathed.
To awaken the Dormant Eye, please right click.
Find the Heart of the Earth
It's a foundational ingredient that can be found in dungeons.
Both a curse and a blessing.
Oh the luxury! Even more exquisite!
This ring makes Piglins neutral towards you.
Create the Essence of Raging Life
Create the Charm of the Treasure Hunter
Acquire the Heart of the Cosmos
It uhhh... regenerates itself over time.
It's your Ender Chest, but it is on you at all times.
One thousand voices emanate from the scroll.
You can now add lore to your stuff.
These scrolls are so dark that you can't see the surface of it as you hold it in your hands.
It devours curses, what did you expect?
Acquire the Eye of the Nebula
Acquire the Emblem of Monster Slayer
Acquire the Emblem of Bloodstained Valor
